rationale: The "au-fhir-base" Implementation Guide focuses on standardizing healthcare data representation in Australia using FHIR, indicating a primary focus on Infrastructure and Foundational aspects by defining a base for other Australian FHIR IGs. It leverages the FHIR R4 standard and aims to improve data exchange within the Australian healthcare system, suggesting a scope of Data Exchange and a geographic scope of "Other Regions (Australia)".  It's designed as a foundational standard applicable across different data sources and is currently in normative/standard status as it's published as a standard for use.
